note.p: Schoolteacher. Daughter of Alfred Russel Wallace and Annie Wallace. Worked as a kindergarten teacher in Liverpool; later started a school near her parents at Tulgey Wood, Broadstone.
Census returns of England and Wales 1911 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG14/12264/41)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966, 1973–95 (Ancestry.com, accessed 3 January 2018)
